author: Stahly
description:
Happy New Year! We're starting 2026 with a look back at the best posts from December 2025. We had XXL reviews of hyped products like Vallejo True Metallic Metal paints, the new Cataphractii in the Siege Assault Battle Group, plus tips and many miniature showcases. December was also marked by the turn of the year, with Stahly and Dunk reflecting on their hobby year and sharing their resolutions for 2026.

The post Best of: Tale of Painters December 2025 appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Best of: Tale of Painters December 2025
